default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Haha, so you actually managed to shackle me. Looks like you do have some tricks up your sleeve... What a refreshing challenge. I accept your duel!

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Ha! Prepare to get torn apart by the mad dog!

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Now, I stand at the apex, waiting to be challenged by you all!

default.title: Level Start
default.text: C'mon, let's fight!

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Yeah... Yeah! Kneel and beg for mercy! Just like that!

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Don't get cocky! I'll win everything back!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Have a taste of this!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Ha... A gladiator should die... on the battlefield...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Let's have a fight! If you beat me, I'll consider letting you through to the office.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Why do I fight so hard on the field? Haha, no reason! I just like to win!

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Law of the jungle? Ha! Brawn is shit in fights. You've got to use your brain to win!

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: What's the "Syndicate Spirit"? Winner takes all, that's what! Only fools care about ethics. For me, the end justifies the means.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Mmm... You're a smart cookie. You're way more interesting than those brutes who are all brawn and no brains.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Those guys who used to surround me were like dogs wagging their tails for a treat, so I dealt with them like the dogs they were... Why the frown? I don't mean you!

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Back in the arena, they always looked at me in disgust, as if I were a mad dog. Yet they also feared me to death. I like the way you look at me... you're not like them.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: I've only ever fought for myself, but you're a smart cookie who managed to "shackle" me... Then, my strength may also bring you victory.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Hey, come and throw a few shots at me. I feel like I'm getting rusty!

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Pfft, you also want to taste some nails?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: What are you looking at? Wanna fight?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Where's the fight?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Here, these are the spoils today. Tsk, those chickens fled before I had enough fun.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Yeah, just like that! Fight! Keep fighting!

default.title: Deploy
default.text: It's finally my turn on the battlefield!

suit_up_outlaw.title: Obtain Attire
suit_up_outlaw.text: You've got some nerve, treating a gladiator like a guard dog. And just make sure to keep a tight grip on that leash of yours, or else... I might bite someone you'd rather I didn't.

suit_up_outlaw.title: Greeting
suit_up_outlaw.text: Look, all I see here are a bunch of dressed-up softies. Will they really give me a good fight? 'Cause if not, you better make it up to me when we get back.

suit_up_outlaw.title: Ordinary Contact 1
suit_up_outlaw.text: This outfit's so uncomfortable. It barely has any room for anything... Seems like those scaredy-cat rich folks do have a brain after all. But this little trick won't stop me... I've never tried using diamonds to fight before, let's see if these rich folks' trinkets are up to the task of being my props!

suit_up_outlaw.title: Ordinary Contact 2
suit_up_outlaw.text: See that guy over there? He's got a weird stench on him. I bet he's got poison with him. And that one, he's the type to hit first, and ask later. But his buddy won't agree... How do I know all this? Ha, don't play dumb. You brought me along because of my keen nose and sharp ears, didn't you?

suit_up_outlaw.title: Idle
suit_up_outlaw.text: We need to make a quick getaway? This route is the shortest. There are people in the way... That path ahead is blocked... Damn, planning an escape before the fight even starts is a new low for me... But this is an exception. Don't even think about making me do this ever again!

suit_up_outlaw.title: Special Attention
suit_up_outlaw.text: No need to keep such a close eye on me... I won't run, and I won't cause any trouble. After all, you're the one holding the leash... What are you worried about?

suit_up_outlaw.title: Level Up
suit_up_outlaw.text: That's not enough. I need a few more reckless fools to sharpen my teeth on!

suit_up_outlaw.title: Annoyed
suit_up_outlaw.text: Hey, hey, hey, you're all flustered just from loosening a collar. You can't even handle this? Hey, you big oaf! Which hand did you touch my boss with? You don't want to keep it anymore!
